snippet: The state was ordered Monday to release information about its supplier of lethal injection drugs to lawyers for death row inmates who are challenging the state’s execution secrecy law.
abstract: Judge Wendell Griffen of Pulaski County Circuit Court orders state of  Arkansas to release information on three lethal injection drugs after lawyers for death row inmates challenge state's execution secrecy law; execution of eight inmates is delayed until further notice.
lead_paragraph: The state was ordered Monday to release information about its supplier of lethal injection drugs to lawyers for death row inmates who are challenging the state’s execution secrecy law.

headline.main: Arkansas: Judge Orders Release of Details on Execution Drugs
headline.print_headline: Arkansas: Judge Orders Release of Details on Execution Drugs
